PersonTrait.name: PersonTrait
PersonTrait.description: Represents the traits of a person.

ArchivedDate.description: The date on which the person trait was archived.

Category.description: Specifies the category of the person trait.

ContactId.description: The contact associated with the person trait.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency related to the person trait.

Description.description: The description of the person trait.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the person trait is active (true) or not (false).

Name.description: The name of the person trait.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns this record.

Source.description: Specifies the information source of the person trait.

StartDate.description: Specifies the start date of the person trait.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the person trait.
